name: Heavy vehicle driving 3d parking simulator
description:
Heavy vehicle driving simulator

Heavy vehicles driver, hop in to the off-road pickup cargo truck, drive heavy trucks to excavate through and transport heavy vehicles on your cargo trailer truck to their destination in time.
Heavy Road Excavator Crane is the new 3d simulator game for you to work as a city builder in this simulator game. This game will let you have the full control over the different vehicles including sand excavator , dump truck , trailer and road roller.

Then you get to drive the vehicles. Smooth steering, hydraulic controls, first person driving view and heavy machinery drive all here in city roads builder sim 3d. Experience driving excavator and truck all ready at construction site.
Heavy machinery and vehicles are not easy to drive so be careful and perfect in your duty as a heavy excavator crane driver in this 3d
simulator game.

key features:

Smooth Steering, Hydraulic Brakes, Lifting and Rotation Controls
Amazing 3D Graphics & Environment
Multiple Game play Missions
HD Graphics, Animations and Sound Effects
Real-time Simulation & Driving
